RICE
TUNA
SALMON
AVOCADO
GREEN ONIONS
ROMAINE LETTUCE
CUCUMBER
CARROT
SESAME OIL ---- (OIL AND SESAME SEED)
SPICY SAUCE ---- (SOYBEAN OIL, WATER, EGG YOLKS, DISTILLED VINEGAR, HIGH FRUCTOSE CORN SYRUP, WHOLE EGGS, SALT, MUSTARD BRAN, SPICE, LEMON JUICE CONCENTRATE, CALCIUM DISODIUM EDTA ADDED TO PROTECT FLAVOR, CHILI, VINEGAR, GARLIC, SUGAR, POTASSIUM SORBATE & SODIUM BISULFITE AS PRESERVATIVES, XANTHAN GUM, SESAME SEED OIL)
PONZU SAUCE ---- (SOY SAUCE(WATER, WHEAT, SOYBEANS, ACID, LEMON JUICE, AUTOLYZED YEAST EXTRACT, NATURAL LEMON AND ORANGE FLAVORS WITH OTHER NATURAL FLAVORS, SUCCINIC ACID, DISODIUM INOSINATE, DISODIUM GUANYLATE, SODIUM BENZOATE:LESS THAN 1/10 OF 1% AS A PRESERVATIVE)
